Blade Guide.name: Blade Guide
Blade Guide.fullText:
Eternal Blade Feature Blade Guide

You home in on your foe, linking your weapon to its life force to improve your accuracy.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: The enemy nearest to you in the burst

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to opportunity attack rolls against the target, and it grants combat advantage to you while you’re the only creature adjacent to it.

Augment 1

Special: If the target drops to 0 hit points during this encounter, you regain the use of this power.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 58.
Blade Guide.flavor: You home in on your foe, linking your weapon to its life force to improve your accuracy.

Eternal Vigilance.name: Eternal Vigilance
Eternal Vigilance.fullText:
Eternal Blade Attack 11Eternal Vigilance

While attacking your foe, you take careful stock of its fighting stance, so when the foe makes its next move, you foil it.

Encounter        Augmentable, Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from you whenever it shifts

Augment 2

Hit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from you and your allies whenever it shifts or makes close attacks.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 58.
Eternal Vigilance.flavor: While attacking your foe, you take careful stock of its fighting stance, so when the foe makes its next move, you foil it.
Eternal Vigilance.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from you whenever it shifts

Augment 2
Eternal Vigilance.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from you and your allies whenever it shifts or makes close attacks.

Guided Aggression.name: Guided Aggression
Guided Aggression.fullText:
Eternal Blade Attack 20Guided Aggression

You delve into your blade guide’s memories to learn the secrets of your foe’s tactics.

Daily        Psionic, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use eternal vigilance against the target as an at-will power. In addition, you regain 2 power points.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 58.
Guided Aggression.flavor: You delve into your blade guide’s memories to learn the secrets of your foe’s tactics.

Blade Guide's Counsel.name: Blade Guide's Counsel
Blade Guide's Counsel.fullText:
Eternal Blade Utility 12Blade Guide's Counsel

Your blade guide provides you with the insight needed to overcome almost any challenge.

Daily        Psionic
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: You gain training in an untrained skill of your choice. The training lasts until your next short rest.


Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 58.
Blade Guide's Counsel.flavor: Your blade guide provides you with the insight needed to overcome almost any challenge.
Blade Guide's Counsel.range:
Personal

Effect: You gain training in an untrained skill of your choice. The training lasts until your next short rest.
Blade Guide's Counsel.effect: You gain training in an untrained skill of your choice. The training lasts until your next short rest.
